title: Google Translate
summary: Google Translate is a multilingual neural machine translation service developed by Google, to translate text, documents and websites from one language into another. It offers a website interface, a mobile app for Android and iOS, and an API that helps developers build browser extensions and software applications.[3] As of December 2021, Google Translate supports 109 languages at various levels and as of AprilÂ 2016, claimed over 500 million total users, with more than 100 billion words translated daily.[4]
